title: Royal Weddings: King's Ransom, A Prince of a Guy, and Every Night at Eight
description: This December, readers say "I do" to Royal Weddingd! Featuring the number-one-selling Silhouette author Diana Palmer, as well as top Silhouette authors Kathleen Korbel and Marion Smith Collins, these regal tales of blooming love among the blue bloods will prove to be the jewel in the crown of sales! Original.
author: Diana Palmer
